results.title: Coconut Oil Nanoemulsion Loaded with a Statin Hypolipidemic Drug for Management of Burns: Formulation and In Vivo Evaluation
results.text_hl: The mean @<m>DISEASE_Burns</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002056 @@@burn@@@ wound diameter was reduced by 2.3-fold and 2.6-fold compared with F2 and F1, which contained @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@SMV@@@ alone, and CnO alone, respectively.

results.title: Simvastatin treatment improves survival in a murine model of burn sepsis: Role of interleukin 6.
results.text_hl: In the current study @SPECIES_10090 @@@mice@@@ were anesthetized and subjected to a dorsal 30% TBSA scald @<m>DISEASE_Burns</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002056 @@@burn@@@. @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ or placebo were administered by intraperitoneal injection once daily or every 12h.
